Member Function Documentation

void brics_3d::PCA::computePrincipleComponents ( PointCloud3D *  inputPointCloud,
Eigen::MatrixXd &  eigenvectors,
Eigen::VectorXd &  eigenvalues 
)

Compute the principle components for a point cloud.

Parameters:
[in]inputPointCloudThe input point cloud.
[in]eigenvectorsEigen vectors representing the principle components. Sorted in descending order of eigen values.
[out]eigenvaluesCorresponding eingen values. Sorted in descending order.
